CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 9, 1946, pg. 28, reads: "Septuagenarian Feted - J. E. Jones of 425 Robinson Court was honored at a surprise birthday party, recently, in observance of his seventy-second birthday.  Among those present to felicitate the well known Pittsburgher were, seated left to right: Louise Jones, the Rev. Ben Jones, Gladys Robinson, John Jones, Rose Jones, Hubert Braswell, Virginia Jones, and Master Eugene Robinson.  Standing, left to right: Roland Jones, Rose Robinson, Fred Jones, Ellen Bonnerman, Leroy Jones, Mary Allen, Horace Jones, Alyce Bennett, Claude Jones. Others attending the party but not pictured include Gertrude Jones, Louis Bonnerman, James Hicks and Charles Bennett. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Louise Jones, Rev. Ben Jones, Gladys Robinson, John Jones, Rose Jones, Hubert Braswell, Virginia Jones, Eugene Robinson; standing: Roland Jones, Rose Robinson, Fred Jones, Ellen Bonnerman, Leroy Jones, Mary Allen, Horace Jones, Alyce Bennett, and Claude Jones gathered for Johns Jones's seventy-second birthday party in his home, 425 Robinson Court
